name: recent_trades_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crypto_markets.
Tool description: Get all crypto markets data live
API description: Fetches the recent trades for a given cryptocurrency symbol from the RapidAPI crypto markets service.

symbol.description: The cryptocurrency symbol (e.g., 'BTC' for Bitcoin) for which recent trades are to be fetched.

limit.description: The number of recent trades to retrieve. Default is 500; maximum is 1000.
